023
024package org.opt4j.operators.algebra;
025
026import org.opt4j.core.Genotype;
027import org.opt4j.core.optimizer.Operator;
028
029import com.google.inject.ImplementedBy;
030
031/**
032 * <p>
033 * The {@link Algebra} operator. By default this class is implemented by the
034 * {@link AlgebraDouble}.
035 * </p>
036 * <p>
037 * Since the operator method is accepting {@code varargs} it cannot be
038 * parameterized for each genotype.
039 * </p>
040 * 
041 * @author lukasiewycz
042 * 
043 * @param <G>
044 *            the type of genotype
045 */
046@ImplementedBy(AlgebraGenericImplementation.class)
047public interface Algebra<G extends Genotype> extends Operator<G> {
048
049        /**
050         * Performs the {@link Term} for each element of the given {@link Genotype}s
051         * and returns the resulting {@link Genotype}.
052         * 
053         * @param term
054         *            the term
055         * @param genotypes
056         *            the genotypes
057         * @return the resulting genotype
058         */
059        public G algebra(Term term, Genotype... genotypes);
060
061}
